report.title: Reference output basic
report.description: Basic output of a reference range calculation for a range of static bat detector record nights.
report.query: select fullset.import_guid, fullset.id, fullset.date_start as night, cttl.preferred_taxon as species, fullset.passes, round(fullset.percentile*100) as percentile from ( select import_guid, id, date_start, taxa_taxon_list_id, passes, percent_rank() over (order by passes) as percentile from ecobat_occurrences o where 1=1 #filters# ) as fullset join cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=fullset.taxa_taxon_list_id where fullset.import_guid='#import_guid#'

param.name: limit_spatial
param.description: Limit to records from radius - distance specified by limit_spatial_km parameter

param.name: limit_time_of_year_from
param.description: Limit to records from this day number in the year

param.name: limit_time_of_year_to
param.description: Limit to records up to this day number in the year
